name: Stickman Luge - Winter Games!
description:
Race down the slopes and catch some air in this crazy sledding game!

From the makers of the worldwide hit app, Stickman Trampoline.

With an Olympic-style theme to celebrate Winter Games in Sochi, Stickman Luge will keep you entertained and addicted for hours. But this isn't your standard luge experience - think of it more like a crazy-backcountry-freestyle sledding game!

FEATURES:
-Race against the clock and progress through 4 mountain themes
-Step it up with crazy tricks like sled flips, handstands, and more
-Choose from 5 different Stickman characters
-Multiplayer action! Compete with your friends & see their progress on the screen

Can you make it to the finish line on time? Don't get stuck in the cold - Download now for FREE!
